page.title: 13Stopsley Holes Farm
page.content: Mr.Lee farms 200 acres of land which is owned by Sir Thomas Pilkington.They have 7 ponies.Before Mrs.Lee had arthritis they had 60 ponies.They also have 1 alsation, 7 cats,7 kittens and 200 budgies.Mr.Lee always wanted to be a farmer.He grows 7o acres of winter barley,5 acres of oats,16 acres of spring barley,and 106 acres of winter wheat.He has 4 tractors, a combine harvester, a drill,a cultivator,a sprayer, a baler and 4 trailers. Trevor, who works with Mr.Lee, likes harvesting and drilling best.He also enjoys working the computer. Their main source of income is their crops.
